# Texture

**Inherits:** [Resource](class_resource.md) **<** [RefCounted](class_refcounted.md) **<** [Object](class_object.md)

**Inherited By:** [Texture2D](class_texture2d.md), [Texture3D](class_texture3d.md), [TextureLayered](class_texturelayered.md)

Base class for all texture types.

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Description

**Texture** is the base class for all texture types. Common texture types are [Texture2D](class_texture2d.md) and [ImageTexture](class_imagetexture.md). See also [Image](class_image.md).
